nodes.text: The Obi-Wan Kenobi Starter Set is one of the first starter sets released by Fantasy Flight Games' for the Star Wars: Destiny dice and card game. It was released on April 4, 2019 concurrently with the General Grievous Starter Set.

Travel back to the time of the Clone Wars with the Obi-Wan-Kenobi Starter Set for Star Wars™: Destiny! The set lets you take control of General Obi-Wan Kenobi and Duchess Satine Kryze in their fight against the Separatist Army. With twenty-four cards and nine dice, the Obi-Wan Kenobi Starter Set contains everything you need to take your first steps into Star Wars: Destiny!
